snippet.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Playthrough Part 1
snippet.description: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure also known as Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken is a short Super Famicom RPG released only in Japan in 1993, this game is based on stardust crusaders, the third arc of the long-running JoJo's Bizarre Adventure manga. It's a somewhat abridged version of the story, Here is some info on the story to start the game, In a futuristic world, there lives a young man named Jojo who holds a terrible power within: the power to drain life from enemies. This power is somehow connected to the evil vampire Dio who is terrorizing the world. Jojo must find faithful companions on his quest to restore peace and to master the power within himself. By the way I am using a English patch which was recently released by Aeon Genesis to play this game.
